tool_description: Generate realistic fake data of all kinds
name: Faker
title: Faker

api_list.name: Hash
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://alanaktion-faker-v1.p.rapidapi.com/hash/md5"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alanaktion-faker-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
